#summary This page shows how to use the MS XML parser

= Introduction =

This tools parse the XML results from MS experiments and extract the proteins identified to be used in the *JBioWH* framework.

The parser includes the MS XML formats from [http://www.ebi.ac.uk/pride/ Proteomics Identifications Database] and [http://www.thegpm.org/bioml/ BioML].

= Details =

First, open the MS XM parser dialog under the MS Tool menu
